00037 class Vector2D  
00038 {
00039 public:
00040     double x, y;
00041 
00042 // Constructors & destructor...
00043 
00044     Vector2D():x(0.0),y(0.0){}
00045     Vector2D(double X, double Y):x(X),y(Y){}
00046     Vector2D(double X, double Y, double l, double a):
00047         x(l * cos(a) + X),   y(l * sin(a) + Y){}
00048     Vector2D(const Vector2D &v, double l, double a):
00049         x(l * cos(a) + v.x), y(l * sin(a) + v.y){}
00050 
00051     // destructor
00052     ~Vector2D() {};
00053 
00054 // Overloaded operators...
00055     inline Vector2D     operator+(const Vector2D&)const;
00056     inline Vector2D     operator-(const Vector2D&)const;
00057     inline Vector2D     operator*(double)const;
00058 
00059     inline Vector2D     &operator+=(const Vector2D&); 
00060     inline Vector2D     &operator-=(const Vector2D&);
00061     inline Vector2D     &operator*=(double);
00062 
00063     inline Vector2D     operator-()const;
00064 
00065     inline bool         operator==(const Vector2D&)const;  // equality
00066     inline bool         operator!=(const Vector2D&)const;   
00067 
00068 // Mutators...
00069     inline void         SetX(double X) { x = X; }
00070     inline void         SetY(double Y) { y = Y; }
00071 
00072     inline void         SetPolarCoordinates(double,double); // length & angle
00073     inline void         SetCartesian(double,double);    // standard x,y 
00074 
00075     inline void         SetLength(double);
00076     inline bool         incLength(double);
00077     inline bool         decLength(double);
00078 
00079     inline void         SetAngle(double);
00080 
00081     inline void         normalise();           // convert to a unit vector
00082     inline void         rotate(double);        // rotate the Vector2D
00083     inline Vector2D     rotation(double)const; // rotate and return the rotated vector
00084 
00085 // Accessors...
00086     double              GetX()const { return x; }
00087     double              GetY()const { return y; }
00088 
00089     inline double       GetLength()const;
00090     inline double       GetLengthSquared()const;
00091     inline double       GetAngle()const;
00092     inline double       GetGradient()const;
00093 
00094     inline Vector2D     GetReciprocal()const; // return reciprocal vector
00095     inline Vector2D     GetNormalised()const; // return unit vector form
00096     inline Vector2D     GetPerpendicular()const;
00097

00101     inline void         Unserialise(std::istream&);

00103 
00105 bool Vector2D::operator==(const Vector2D& other)const
00106 {
00107     return (x == other.x && y == other.y);
00108 }
00109 
00111 bool Vector2D::operator!=(const Vector2D& other)const
00112 {
00113     return (x != other.x || y != other.y);  
00114 }
00115 
00117 Vector2D Vector2D::operator*(double l)const
00118 {
00119     return Vector2D(x * l, y * l);
00120 }
00121 
00123 inline Vector2D operator*(double l, const Vector2D& v)
00124 {
00125     return v * l;
00126 }
00127 
00129 Vector2D& Vector2D::operator*=(double l)
00130 {
00131     x *= l;
00132     y *= l;
00133     return *this;
00134 }
00135 
00137 Vector2D Vector2D::operator+(const Vector2D& other)const
00138 {
00139     return Vector2D(x + other.x, y + other.y);
00140 }
00141 
00143 Vector2D& Vector2D::operator +=(const Vector2D& other)
00144 {
00145     x += other.x;
00146     y += other.y;
00147     return *this;
00148 }
00149 
00151 Vector2D Vector2D::operator-(const Vector2D& other)const {
00152     return Vector2D(x - other.x, y - other.y);
00153 }   
00154 
00156 Vector2D& Vector2D::operator -=(const Vector2D& other)
00157 {
00158     x -= other.x;
00159     y -= other.y;
00160     return *this;
00161 }
00162 
00164 Vector2D Vector2D::operator-()const
00165 {
00166     return Vector2D(-x, -y);
00167 }
00168 
00170 void Vector2D::normalise()
00171 {
00172     if (x == 0.0 && y == 0.0) {
00173         y = 1.0;
00174         return;
00175     }
00176     double invLength = 1 / GetLength();
00177     x *= invLength;
00178     y *= invLength;
00179 }
00180 
00182 void Vector2D::rotate(double a)
00183 {
00184     double m1 = cos(a);
00185     double m2 = sin(a);
00186     x = m1 * x - m2 * y;
00187     y = m1 * y + m2 * x; // -m2 and m1 stand in for m3 and m4
00188 }
00189 
00191 Vector2D Vector2D::rotation(double a)const
00192 {
00193     double m1 = cos(a);
00194     double m2 = sin(a);
00195     return Vector2D(m1 * x - m2 * y, m1 * y + m2 * x); // -m2 and m1 stand in for m3 and m4
00196 }
00197 
00202 void Vector2D::SetPolarCoordinates(double l,double a)
00203 {
00204     x = l * cos(a);
00205     y = l * sin(a);
00206 }
00207 
00209 void Vector2D::SetLength(double l)
00210 {
00211     normalise();
00212     operator*=(l);
00213 }
00214 
00216 void Vector2D::SetAngle(double a)
00217 {
00218     *this = Vector2D(0.0, 0.0, GetLength(), a);
00219 }
00220 
00222 void Vector2D::SetCartesian(double X, double Y)
00223 {
00224     x = X;
00225     y = Y;
00226 }
00227 
00229 Vector2D Vector2D::GetReciprocal()const
00230 {
00231     return Vector2D(-x, -y);
00232 }
00233 
00235 Vector2D Vector2D::GetNormalised()const
00236 {
00237     if (x == 0.0 && y == 0.0) {
00238         return Vector2D(0.0,1.0);
00239     }
00240     double invLength = 1 / GetLength();
00241     return Vector2D(invLength * x, invLength * y);
00242 }
00243 
00245 double Vector2D::dot(const Vector2D& other)const
00246 {
00247     return x * other.x + y * other.y;
00248 }
00249 
00251 double Vector2D::GetLength()const
00252 {
00253     return sqrt(GetLengthSquared());
00254 }
00255 
00257 double Vector2D::GetLengthSquared()const
00258 {
00259     return x * x + y * y;
00260 }
00261 
00263 double Vector2D::GetAngle()const
00264 {
00265     if      (x==0)  return y>=0 ? PI/2 : -PI/2;
00266     else if (x > 0) return atan(y/x);
00267     else            return atan(y/x) + PI;
00268 }
00269 
00271 double Vector2D::GetGradient()const
00272 {
00273     return x == 0 ? DBL_MAX : y / x;
00274 
00275 }
00276 
00278 Vector2D Vector2D::GetPerpendicular()const
00279 {
00280     return Vector2D(-y,x);
00281 }

00284 void Vector2D::Serialise(std::ostream& out)const
00285 {
00286     out << "Vector2D " << x << " " << y << "\n";
00287 }
00288 
00290 void Vector2D::Unserialise(std::istream& in)
00291 {
00292     std::string name;
00293     in >> name;
00294     if (name != "Vector2D") {
00295         throw SerialException(SERIAL_ERROR_DATA_MISMATCH, "", 
00296                               "Expected Vector2D but got " + name);
00297     }
00298 
00299     in >> x >> y;
00300 }

00305 double deg2rad(double angle) {
00306     return angle/360.0 * TWOPI;
00307 }
00308 
00310 double rad2deg(double angle) {
00311     double result = (angle/TWOPI) * 360.0;
00312     return result;
00313 }

00322 inline Vector2D PolarVector(double l, double a)
00323 {
00324     return Vector2D(0.0, 0.0, l, a);
00325 }
